welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sollies-Pont, a beautiful and charming city in southern France known for its historic landmarks and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Palyvestre Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Castellet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Castellet Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at La Mole Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at La Mole Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
